snippet.title: Cabernet | Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
Check out Cabernet on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2401410/Cabernet/

Cabernet is a 2D narrative RPG set in a 19th century Eastern European inspired world where you play as Liza, a newly converted vampire, struggling between keeping her humanity and abandoning it for her new life as a blood sucker.

In two weeks you’ll sink your fangs into Cabernet and learn about the life of a new converted vampire. Will you retain your humanity or descend further into the horror you have become?
